inputsClass.name: esTooltipTouchGestures
inputsClass.rawdescription:
How touch gestures should be handled by the tooltip. On touch devices the tooltip directive
uses a long press gesture to show and hide, however it can conflict with the native browser
gestures. To work around the conflict, Angular Material disables native gestures on the
trigger, but that might not be desirable on particular elements (e.g. inputs and draggable
elements). The different values for this option configure the touch event handling as follows:
- auto - Enables touch gestures for all elements, but tries to avoid conflicts with native
browser gestures on particular elements. In particular, it allows text selection on inputs and
textareas, and preserves the native browser dragging on elements marked as draggable.
- on - Enables touch gestures for all elements and disables native browser gestures with no
exceptions.
- off - Disables touch gestures. Note that this will prevent the tooltip from showing on touch
devices.
inputsClass.description:
How touch gestures should be handled by the tooltip. On touch devices the tooltip directive uses a long press gesture to show and hide, however it can conflict with the native browser gestures. To work around the conflict, Angular Material disables native gestures on the trigger, but that might not be desirable on particular elements (e.g. inputs and draggable elements). The different values for this option configure the touch event handling as follows:

  • auto - Enables touch gestures for all elements, but tries to avoid conflicts with native browser gestures on particular elements. In particular, it allows text selection on inputs and textareas, and preserves the native browser dragging on elements marked as draggable.
  • on - Enables touch gestures for all elements and disables native browser gestures with no exceptions.
  • off - Disables touch gestures. Note that this will prevent the tooltip from showing on touch devices.

propertiesClass.name: destroyed$
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Emits when the component is destroyed.

propertiesClass.name: onKeyDown
propertiesClass.description: Handles the keydown events on the host element. Needs to be an arrow function so that we can use it in addEventListener.
propertiesClass.rawdescription:
Handles the keydown events on the host element.
Needs to be an arrow function so that we can use it in addEventListener.

propertiesClass.name: touchstartTimeout
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Timer started at the last `touchstart` event.

methodsClass.name: createOverlay
methodsClass.rawdescription: Create the overlay config and position strategy.
methodsClass.description: Create the overlay config and position strategy.

methodsClass.name: disableNativeGesturesIfNecessary
methodsClass.rawdescription: Disables the native browser gestures, based on how the tooltip has been configured.
methodsClass.description: Disables the native browser gestures, based on how the tooltip has been configured.

methodsClass.name: hide
methodsClass.rawdescription: Hides the tooltip after the delay in ms, defaults to tooltip-delay-hide or 0ms if no input.
methodsClass.description: Hides the tooltip after the delay in ms, defaults to tooltip-delay-hide or 0ms if no input.

methodsClass.name: isTooltipVisible
methodsClass.rawdescription: Returns true if the tooltip is currently visible to the user.
methodsClass.description: Returns true if the tooltip is currently visible to the user.

methodsClass.name: setupPointerEvents
methodsClass.rawdescription: Binds the pointer events to the tooltip trigger.
methodsClass.description: Binds the pointer events to the tooltip trigger.

methodsClass.name: show
methodsClass.rawdescription: Shows the tooltip after the delay in ms, defaults to tooltip-delay-show or 0ms if no input.
methodsClass.description: Shows the tooltip after the delay in ms, defaults to tooltip-delay-show or 0ms if no input.

methodsClass.name: updatePosition
methodsClass.rawdescription: Updates the position of the current tooltip.
methodsClass.description: Updates the position of the current tooltip.

methodsClass.name: updateTooltipMessage
methodsClass.rawdescription: Updates the tooltip message and repositions the overlay according to the new message length.
methodsClass.description: Updates the tooltip message and repositions the overlay according to the new message length.

components.name: DropzoneStoryCustomIconComponent
components.templateData:
<form class="form" [formGroup]="form">
  <es-dropzone
    [heading]="heading"
    [subheading]="subheading"
    svgIcon="upload"
    formControlName="docs"
  >
    <mat-hint>{{
      locale === 'en' ? 'This is an example of a hint message' : '  '
    }}</mat-hint>
  </es-dropzone>
</form>

components.name: DropzoneStoryRequiredComponent

propertiesClass.name: form

components.templateData:
<form #f="ngForm" class="form" [formGroup]="form" (ngSubmit)="onSubmit(f)">
  <es-dropzone
    [heading]="heading"
    [subheading]="subheading"
    formControlName="docs"
    accept="image/png"
  >
    <mat-hint>{{
      locale === 'en' ? 'This is an example of a hint message' : '  '
    }}</mat-hint>
    <mat-error>
      {{ locale === 'en' ? 'Select at least one file' : '    ' }}
    </mat-error>
  </es-dropzone>
  <button class="form__submit" color="primary" mat-flat-button type="submit">
    {{ locale === 'en' ? 'Submit' : '' }}
  </button>
</form>

components.templateData: {{ message }}

components.name: InlineFormFieldStoryBasicComponent
components.templateData:
<es-inline-form-field [text]="text">
  <mat-form-field>
    <input [(ngModel)]="text" matInput autocomplete="off" />
  </mat-form-field>
</es-inline-form-field>

components.name: InlineFormFieldStoryCompositionComponent
components.templateData:
<es-inline-form-field [text]="date | date: 'M/d/yyyy'" class="inline-form-field">
  <mat-form-field>
    <input [(ngModel)]="date" matInput [matDatepicker]="picker" autocomplete="off" />
    <mat-datepicker-toggle matSuffix [for]="picker"></mat-datepicker-toggle>
    <mat-datepicker #picker></mat-datepicker>
  </mat-form-field>
</es-inline-form-field>

<es-inline-form-field [text]="text" class="inline-form-field">
  <mat-form-field>
    <button matPrefix mat-icon-button>
      <mat-icon>favorite</mat-icon>
    </button>
    <input [(ngModel)]="text" matInput autocomplete="off" />
    <button matSuffix mat-icon-button>
      <mat-icon>thumb_up</mat-icon>
    </button>
  </mat-form-field>
</es-inline-form-field>

<es-inline-form-field [text]="select" class="inline-form-field">
  <mat-form-field>
    <mat-select [(ngModel)]="select">
      <mat-option value="Apple">
        Apple
      </mat-option>
      <mat-option value="Grape">
        Grape
      </mat-option>
      <mat-option value="Pineapple">
        Pineapple
      </mat-option>
    </mat-select>
  </mat-form-field>
</es-inline-form-field>

<es-inline-form-field [text]="hint" class="inline-form-field">
  <mat-form-field>
    <input [(ngModel)]="hint" matInput autocomplete="off" />
    <mat-hint>This is a hint</mat-hint>
  </mat-form-field>
</es-inline-form-field>

components.name: InlineFormFieldStoryTypographyComponent
components.templateData:
<es-inline-form-field [text]="text" [typography]="typography">
  <mat-form-field>
    <input [(ngModel)]="text" matInput placeholder="Placeholder" autocomplete="off" />
  </mat-form-field>
</es-inline-form-field>

<es-inline-form-field [text]="textMultiline" [typography]="typography">
  <mat-form-field>
    <textarea
      [(ngModel)]="textMultiline"
      matInput
      matTextareaAutosize
      placeholder="Placeholder"
      autocomplete="off"
    ></textarea>
  </mat-form-field>
</es-inline-form-field>

components.name: InlineFormFieldStoryValidationComponent
components.templateData:
<form [formGroup]="form">
  <es-inline-form-field [text]="form.get('text').value" class="inline-form-field">
    <mat-form-field>
      <input formControlName="text" matInput autocomplete="off" />
      <mat-error *ngIf="form.get('text').hasError('required')">
        This field is required
      </mat-error>
    </mat-form-field>
  </es-inline-form-field>

  <es-inline-form-field
    [text]="form.get('server').value"
    [manualSave]="true"
    (save)="onSave($event)"
    class="inline-form-field"
  >
    <mat-form-field>
      <input formControlName="server" matInput autocomplete="off" />
      <mat-error *ngIf="form.get('server').hasError('required')">
        This field is required
      </mat-error>
    </mat-form-field>
  </es-inline-form-field>
</form>

components.name: PaginatorStoryBasicComponent
components.templateData:
<es-paginator
  [count]="count"
  [siblingCount]="siblingCount"
  [boundaryCount]="boundaryCount"
  [page]="page"
  [pageSize]="pageSize"
  [pageSizeOptions]="pageSizeOptions"
  (pageChange)="onPageChange($event)"
  (pageSizeChange)="onPageSizeChange($event)"
></es-paginator>

variables.name: ACTION_HEADING_STORY_BASIC_SOURCE
variables.defaultValue:
{
  html: `
    <es-action-heading
      [text]="text"
      [type]="type"
      [typography]="typography"
      [actionLabel]="actionLabel"
      [actionIcon]="actionIcon"
      [actionSvgIcon]="actionSvgIcon"
      [color]="color"
      (action)="onAction()">
    </es-action-heading>
  `
}

variables.name: ALERT_STORY_ACTIONS_SOURCE
variables.defaultValue:
{
  html: `
  <es-alert>
    Message
    <es-alert-actions>
      <button mat-flat-button (click)="onAction()">Action</button>
      <button mat-button (click)="onCancel()">Cancel</button>
    </es-alert-actions>
  </es-alert>
  `
}

variables.defaultValue:
{
  html: `
  <es-inline-form-field [text]="text">

variables.name: INLINE_FORM_FIELD_STORY_COMPOSITION_SOURCE
variables.defaultValue:
{
  html: `
  <es-inline-form-field [text]="date | date: 'M/d/yyyy'">
    <mat-form-field>
      <input [(ngModel)]="date" matInput [matDatepicker]="picker" />
      <mat-datepicker-toggle matSuffix [for]="picker"></mat-datepicker-toggle>
      <mat-datepicker #picker></mat-datepicker>
    </mat-form-field>
  </es-inline-form-field>

  <es-inline-form-field [text]="text">
    <mat-form-field>
      <button matPrefix mat-icon-button>
        <mat-icon>favorite</mat-icon>
      </button>
      <input [(ngModel)]="text" matInput />
      <button matSuffix mat-icon-button>
        <mat-icon>thumb_up</mat-icon>
      </button>
    </mat-form-field>
  </es-inline-form-field>

  <es-inline-form-field [text]="select">
    <mat-form-field>
      <mat-select [(ngModel)]="select">
        <mat-option value="Apple">
          Apple
        </mat-option>
        <mat-option value="Grape">
          Grape
        </mat-option>
        <mat-option value="Pineapple">
          Pineapple
        </mat-option>
      </mat-select>
    </mat-form-field>
  </es-inline-form-field>

  <es-inline-form-field [text]="hint">
    <mat-form-field>
      <input [(ngModel)]="hint" matInput />
      <mat-hint>This is a hint</mat-hint>
    </mat-form-field>
  </es-inline-form-field>
  `
}

  </es-inline-form-field>
  `
}

variables.name: TOOLTIP_STORY_THEMING_SOURCE
typeMatchesFilenameExtension
variables.defaultValue:
(type: string, fileName: string): boolean =>
  type.charAt(0) === '.' && fileName.toLowerCase().endsWith(type)

variables.name: typeMatchesFileType
variables.defaultValue:
(type: string, fileType: string): boolean =>
  type.endsWith('/*') && fileType.startsWith(type.replace(/\/.*$/, ''))

variables.name: typesMatch
variables.defaultValue:
(types: string[], file: File): boolean =>
  types.some(
    (type) =>
      type === file.type ||
      typeMatchesFileType(type, file.type) ||
      typeMatchesFilenameExtension(type, file.name)
  )

projects/elonkit/src/utils/validate-file.name: typeMatchesFilenameExtension
projects/elonkit/src/utils/validate-file.defaultValue:
(type: string, fileName: string): boolean =>
  type.charAt(0) === '.' && fileName.toLowerCase().endsWith(type)

projects/elonkit/src/utils/validate-file.name: typeMatchesFileType
projects/elonkit/src/utils/validate-file.defaultValue:
(type: string, fileType: string): boolean =>
  type.endsWith('/*') && fileType.startsWith(type.replace(/\/.*$/, ''))

projects/elonkit/src/utils/validate-file.name: typesMatch
projects/elonkit/src/utils/validate-file.defaultValue:
(types: string[], file: File): boolean =>
  types.some(
    (type) =>
      type === file.type ||
      typeMatchesFileType(type, file.type) ||
      typeMatchesFilenameExtension(type, file.name)
  )

projects/elonkit/src/utils/validate-file.name: validateFileType
